summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Team page profile pictures implementation. All requirements successfully verified: Vorsitzender, Bereichsleiter, and Team members display real profile pictures while 'Weitere Mitglieder' correctly show initials only.
passed_tests: Vorsitzender (Maximilian Pilsner) displays profile picture successfully
All 4 Bereichsleiter (Lucia, Stefan, Sebastian, Carolina) display profile pictures
All 14 Team members (Simon, Matej, Florian, etc.) display profile pictures
All 12 'Weitere Mitglieder' correctly show initials only (no pictures)
All 19 profile images load without 404 errors
Image file naming follows Vorname-Nachname.png format correctly
Profile pictures stored in correct directory (/images/team/)
